tool_description: The FIFA World Cup is a professional association football tournament held between national football teams. Organised by FIFA, the tournament, held every four years, was first played in 1930 in Uruguay, and has been contested by 32 teams since the 1998 event. The tournament is contested with eight round-robin groups followed by a knockout round for 16 teams. The defending champions are the French national football team, who defeated the Croatia national football team 4–2 in the 2018 FIFA World...

api_list.description: World Cup Qatar 2022 - Get Latest News
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-cup-qatar-news.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/headlines"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-cup-qatar-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
